title: If the area under DP reservation to be handed over to MCGM, (excluding the areas under DP roads/ road setback), is more than the required area of amenity as per this Regulation, then the provision for amenity is not necessary
clause_text: If the area under DP reservation to be handed over to MCGM, (excluding the areas under DP roads/ road setback), is more than the required area of amenity as per this Regulation, then the provision for amenity is not necessary.
section: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential or Commercial Zone for the Uses permissible in Residential or Commercial Zone
